data.title: Tuesday Weld, horoscope for birth date 27 August 1943, born in Manhattan, with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of Tuesday Weld born on 27 August 1943 Manhattan, New York, with biography
data.text:
Name

Weld, Tuesday Gender: F

Birthname Weld, Susan Ker born on 27 August 1943 at 01:34 (= 01:34 AM ) Place Manhattan, New York, 40n46, 73w59 Timezone EWT h4w (is war time) Data source

BC/BR in hand

Rodden Rating AA Collector: Rodden

Astrology data 03°05' 23°59 Asc. 05°27'

Biography

American actress who, by the age of 21, had been in a dozen movies and well over a hundred TV shows. Her childhood, however, was anything but glamorous. Her dad died when she was three, and from the age of three she supported her family as a professional model. The enormous stress put upon her by professional and family demands precipitated her first nervous breakdown at the age of nine. By the next year, she was drinking heavily and, at 12, she first attempted suicide with aspirin, sleeping pills and gin. At 16 she began to break away from her mom, flaunting her drinking and affairs with older men.

Seven years later, in 1966, she married for the first time, having a daughter in September 1972. After a divorce, she married actor Dudley Moore in 1975 for a very stormy relationship. Although their marriage was a rocky one, they had a son, Patrick, in 1977. Her marriage with Moore eventually ended and she married the violinish Pinchas Zuckerman on 18 October 1985. They divorced in 1998.

On 22 March 2005 her older brother Lothrop died; he was 82, many years her senior.

Link to Wikipedia biography
